Package it.polimi.se2.clupapplication.controllers

Class TicketController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.se2.clupapplication.controllers.TicketController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/ticket")
public class TicketController
extends java.lang.Object
This controller handles the Ticket API, interfacing with the ticketService, the storeService and the userService.

  • Constructor Details

      public TicketController()

  • Method Details

    • asapRetrieving

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')") @GetMapping("/asap") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> asapRetrieving​(@RequestParam java.lang.Long storeId)
      Initiate an ASAP (As Soon As Possible) ticket request, given the id of the store in which the reservation would be made.
      Parameters:
      storeId - the id of the store in which the reservation would be made.
      Returns:
      status code 200 if request is successful, status code 422 if there are no available slots.

    • voidTicket

      @GetMapping("/voidTicket") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> voidTicket​(@RequestParam java.lang.Long ticketId)
      Void a ticket (and an associated booking) given its id.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - the id of the ticket to be voided.
      Returns:
      status code 200

    • getTicketInfo

      @GetMapping("/getTicketInfo") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getTicketInfo​(@RequestParam java.lang.Long ticketId)
      Retrieve all the ticket information given its id.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - the id of the ticket whose information needs to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      200 ok, with the ticket serialized object.

    • validateTicket

      @GetMapping("/validateTicket") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> validateTicket​(@RequestParam java.lang.String uuid)
      Validate a ticket when scanned through its QR Code. This operation is usually made by the store attendants present at the entrance of the supermarket.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique booking id of the ticket.
      Returns:
      status code 200 if request is successfull, status code 400 otherwise.

    • getMyTickets

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'USER\')") @GetMapping("/getMyTickets") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getMyTickets()
      Returns:
      the list of tickets of a user, identified through the personal token attached to the request.

    • getMyStoreTickets

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MANAGER\')") @GetMapping("/getMyStoreUpcomingTickets") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getMyStoreTickets()
      Returns:
      the list of upcoming tickets of a manager's store, identified through the personal token attached to the request.

    • handOutOnSpot

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ATTENDANT\')") @GetMapping("/handOutOnSpot") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handOutOnSpot()
      Handles the procedure of "Hand Out on Spot" functionality. An attendant request a new ASAP ticket from its interface and the system returns him (her) a new ticket object.
      Returns:
      status code 200 (along with a ticket instance) if the request if successful, status code 400 otherwise.
